name: System: Unknown
description:
You are a bounty hunter looking for targets on a remote planetary system that you don't know much about.

You will be visiting different plantes and completing the missions that you find there. The credits you earn in your missions can be spent in the markets and informants that you will find in each planet. In the markets you will be able to purchase items and weapons, while the informants will sell you valuable information that you can use to make better decisions.
